As a student in this course, you have agreed to uphold the [Duke Community Standard](https://trinity.duke.edu/undergraduate/academic-policies/community-standard-student-conduct) and the practices specific to this course.

## Violating the policy on use of outside resources

If you use outside resources (e.g. StackOverflow, ChatGPT, etc) without citing them, we treat that as plagiarism. If the grader has reasonable suspicion that outside resources were used without citation to complete some part of an assignment, they are empowered to immediately give that part a zero and leave a comment explaining why. If we make a mistake, you are welcome to submit a regrade request pleading your case.
